document.full_text: more than 70,000 people have fled fighting in sudan's western darfur region in the last three months, swelling numbers at a major refugee camp by more than third, u.n. humanitarian officials said.
document.title: tens of thousands flood major darfur camp
lines_and_colors: more than 70,000 people have fled fighting in sudan's western darfur region in the last three months, swelling numbers at a major refugee camp by more than third, u.n. humanitarian officials said.
